Player History
Earned first career win on 4/3/1985...
Had first career hit (triple) on 8/22/1986, off Jim Winn (PIT)...
Traded from Atlanta to Toronto on 6/16/1987 (Going to ATL: 3B German Rivera. Going to TOR: P Bruce Sutter)...
Won World Series with Toronto in 1987...
8/17/1988: Signed a contract extension with Toronto, $4,390,000 per year, for 1 years.
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/8/1990 to a 1-year deal worth $5,250,000 per year...
Retired in 1990.
